desc: Daughter of YHWH is an online store for the modest and natural woman who wants to care for and grow their hair without chemical impurities and additives. Our vegan curl line includes every product naturalistas will need for their curly hair as well as custom recipes for clients that prefer to go preservative-free.

layout.text: Our Vegan Line features wholesome , natural products free of all those hair and body polluting synthetic ingredients. Check out our custom formulation feature for products made just for you!
